snippet: Parliament approved two appointees to lead ministries responsible for the nation’s security forces, vacancies that had highlighted sectarian tensions and generated weeks of negotiations.
abstract: Iraqi Parliament approves Mohammed Salem al-Ghabban as interior minister and Khalid al-Obeidi as defense minister after weeks of negotiations.

byline.contributor: Reporting was contributed by Falih Hassan, Sarmad Chalabi, Omar Al-Jawoshy and Ahmed Salah.

lead_paragraph: Parliament approved two appointees to lead ministries responsible for the nation’s security forces, vacancies that had highlighted sectarian tensions and generated weeks of negotiations.

headline.main: After Delay, Iraq Appoints Two to Posts for Security
headline.print_headline: After Delay, Iraq Appoints Two to Posts for Security
